results.description: Robert Lewandowski's 16th goal of the season is not enough to help Bayern Munich defeat Augsburg, who salvaged a draw at the WWK Arena.
results.shortTitle: Lewandowski nets but Augsburg hold Bayern
results.title: Augsburg 2-2 Bayern Munich: Lewandowski scores again in Bayern draw

results.description: Augsburg goalkeeper Tomas Koubek has a howler during his team's 5-1 defeat to Borussia Monchengladbach.
results.title: Bundesliga: Augsburg goalkeeper Tomas Koubek has howler against Monchengladbach

results.description: Watch all the goals from Borussia Dortmund's 5-1 win over FC Augsburg in Germany's Bundesliga, including a great strike from England's Jadon Sancho.
results.shortTitle: Sancho scores as Dortmund beat Augsburg 5-1
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 5-1 FC Augsburg: Jadon Sancho scores in Bundesliga win

results.description: Borussia Dortmund come from behind to begin their Bundesliga campaign with a 5-1 win against Augsburg.
results.shortTitle: Borussia Dortmund ease to opening win
results.title: Borussia Dortmund beat Augsburg 5-1 in season opener

results.description: Southampton sign centre-back Kevin Danso from FC Augsburg on a season-long loan, with an option to buy.
results.shortTitle: Southampton sign defender Danso on loan
results.title: Kevin Danso: Southampton sign defender on loan from Augsburg

results.description: Augsburg sign English defender Reece Oxford from West Ham on a four-year deal after loan spell ends.
results.title: Reece Oxford: West Ham defender joins Augsburg on permanent deal

results.description: South Korea winger Ji Dong-won scores twice for Augsburg in shock win over Bundesliga leaders Borussia Dortmund.
results.shortTitle: Dortmund suffer shock defeat at Augsburg
results.title: Ji Dong-won scores twice as FC Augsburg beat league leaders Borussia Dortmund

results.description: Bayern Munich twice come from behind to beat Augsburg and close the gap on leaders Borussia Dortmund to two points.
results.shortTitle: Bayern win to close gap on Dortmund
results.title: Augsburg 2-3 Bayern Munich: Kingsley Coman scores twice in comeback win

thumbnail.altText: Leon Goretzka, Kingsley Coman and David Alaba (l-r)

results.description: West Ham defender Reece Oxford joins Bundesliga outfit Augsburg on loan for the remainder of the season.
results.title: West Ham: Reece Oxford joins Augsburg on loan

results.description: Former Arsenal goalkeeper Jens Lehmann has been appointed assistant coach at Bundesliga side FC Augsburg.
results.title: Jens Lehmann: FC Augsburg appoint ex-Arsenal goalkeeper as assistant coach

results.description: England's Jadon Sancho claims sixth assist as Borussia Dortmund beat Augsburg in a thriller in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 4-3 Augsburg: England's Jadon Sancho assists another goal in comeback

results.description: Felix Gotze's late equaliser against his former club earns Augsburg a Bundesliga point at Bayern Munich.
results.title: Bayern Munich 1-1 Augsburg: Late Felix Gotze goal denies champions

results.description: Bayern Munich come from behind to wrap up a sixth consecutive Bundesliga title with a 4-1 win over Augsburg.
results.shortTitle: Bayern wrap up sixth title in a row
results.title: Bayern Munich wrap up sixth Bundesliga title in a row with win over Augsburg

results.description: Bayern Munich will seal a sixth consecutive Bundesliga title if they beat Augsburg - but can they do it? Find out here with live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Bayern Munich win Bundesliga title by beating Augsburg
results.title: Augsburg v Bayern Munich: Can Bayern win to clinch Bundesliga title?

results.description: Borussia Dortmund drop points as 25,000 fans boycott their televised draw with Augsburg on Monday night.
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 1-1 FC Augsburg

results.description: Robert Lewandowski scores twice as Bayern Munich beat Bavarian rivals Augsburg to extend their unbeaten start under Jupp Heynckes.
results.title: Bayern Munich 3-0 Augsburg

results.description: Robert Lewandowski scores a hat-trick as Bayern Munich crush struggling Augsburg to close in on a fifth successive Bundesliga title.
results.title: Bayern Munich 6-0 FC Augsburg

thumbnail.altText: Bayern Munich striker Robert Lewandowski celebrates scoring against Augsburg

results.description: Striker Robert Lewandowski ends his Bundesliga goal drought to help leaders Bayern Munich ease to victory over Augsburg.
results.title: FC Augsburg 1-3 Bayern Munich
